title: post_to_database Lambda Input (new_job)
description: The input for the post_to_database Lambda when posting the new status for a job and its files.

jobId.description: The unique ID of the asyncOperation.

granuleId.description: The unique ID of the granule to retrieve status for.

requestTime.description: The time, in UTC and isoformat, when the request to restore the granule was initiated.

archiveDestination.description: The archive destination for the individual files.

files.description: Description and status of the files within the given granule.

filename.description: The name and extension of the file.

keyPath.description: The key of the file to restore.

restoreDestination.description: The name of the glacier bucket the granule is being copied to.

multipartChunksizeMb.description: The maximum size of chunks to use when copying.

statusId.description: The status_id of the restoration of the file. May be 'pending' or 'failed'.

errorMessage.description: If the restoration of the file errored, the error will be stored here.

requestTime.description: The time the restore was requested, in UTC and iso-format.

lastUpdate.description: The last time the file's status changed, in UTC and iso-format.

completionTime.description: The time the restore was completed, in UTC and iso-format.
